work.position: Trainee IT Specialist in System Integration
work.description: Support and maintain the company's infrastructure, factory machines, networking, and employees' PCs. Responsible for patch management, monitoring, backups, hardware troubleshooting, and user support across the site.
Developed and maintained web applications, contributed to new features and internal tools, performed code reviews, and helped improve CI pipelines and deployment processes.
Built backend and frontend components and prototyped a self-hosted AI assistant for agricultural use. Apprenticeship overlapped with studies; worked on integrations and testing.
Two-year BFS programme in Economics (BFS). Focused on business fundamentals, accounting basics, and practical economic skills.
Started Fachoberschule IT to deepen programming and IT knowledge; left after the first year while undertaking an apprenticeship at AGVolution.
Built and maintained small client websites and services, handled deployments, domain/DNS, and ongoing support since 2019.
Designing and developing personal applications for productivity and learning; focusing on robust, maintainable code and small, useful tools.
Volunteer Community Moderator since 21.03.2023 — onboarding new members, moderating discussions, enforcing community guidelines, and assisting users with resources.

Design, deploy and maintain self-hosted services on Proxmox and container platforms since 2022. Migrated earlier VPS-hosted sites and handcrafted websites to local infrastructure, manage backups, DNS, monitoring, and lightweight CI for personal projects.
